name: Cthulhu Party!
description:
"Cthulhu Party!" is a party game for 2 up to 4 players, in which a bunch of cultists compete to awake the best Old One Ever :3!

Who will prove the greater dedication? 

Who will be awarded the outstanding honour of being eaten first?

"Cthulhu Party!" is a 6 months school project almost entirely developed by 2 designers 

(Valerio De Simone & Francesco Catalano)
